Welcome to Dummy Python API Docs!
=================================

Core classes:
-------------

    :class:`dummy_spark.SparkContext`

    Main entry point for Spark functionality.

    :class:`dummy_spark.RDD`

    A Resilient Distributed Dataset (RDD), the basic abstraction in Spark.
